Binary Exploitation.description:
Classic challenge.. this should be easy.. right? right?

Author: Vaints
Binary Exploitation.name: Bad Shell

Binary Exploitation.description:
There's a leak in our feedback BAAS(Binary as a Service). However the binary still working properly, even tho the file descriptor is closed.

Author: Vaints
hints:
* You can override the heap pointer, so that the program won't free (delete) your payload.
* Ever heard of csu? maybe you can use it to control some registers
Binary Exploitation.name: Gets The Flag Out

Author: AnYujin
Cryptography.name: Pal Signer

Cryptography.description:
Alat enkripsi underrated yang TERBUKTI aman dari serangan hengker hengker jahat yang meiliki intensi merusak!!

benarkah begitu? apakah ada kelemahan dalam enkripsi ini yang sudah banyak orang tahu?

Author: AnYujin
Cryptography.name: Reality Club

Reverse Engineering.description:
An instance on another planet has just been cyber attacked, help them recover their imporant data.

*Highly recommended to create an empty directory when debugging it

Author: Vaints
hints: Have you tried to decode the base64? that seems to be the core of the attack
Reverse Engineering.name: Clown

Author: AnYujin
